title: 08/16/21 DPS Hour 3 Mike Sando
itunes:title: 08/16/21 DPS Hour 3 Mike Sando
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Rob Parker, in for Dan, discuss the Lakers new roster and look at what chances they have to win the West given the current landscape of the conference. Is this season about to be a breakout year for Kyler Murray? The Athletic's Mike Sando joins the guys to discuss the placement of Kyler Murray and Matt Stafford in his QB tiers, plus Mike explains why the tiers are crucial to Tom Brady's success. Plus, the guys get heated when debating Tim Tebow's place in the NFL!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
